name: KNISLINGE Sofa, Samsta Dark Brown
description:
(CONTROLS: Press Q to toggle music, Press W to toggle typing noises, and Press E for a dialogue's text appear all at once!)

The date is July 31st. As the vacancy where your couch once stood collects its dust, IKEA's Summer Sale ticks closer to the hour it dissolves away.

180 minutes on the clock, $500 in your pocket. Trouble could arise from any corner.

The race against time begins. Will you be able to buy the sofa of your dreams, or will you exit empty handed?

(Audio Copyright: Bensound Royalty Free Music)(https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/downtown)

A game made for #InkJam2020!

  • Multi-Act, Storylet-based narrative that tells a different story every time you play it!
  • Your choices matter! Decisions you make can open up later decisions!
  • Custom UI that utilizes the Unity engine!
  • Multiple different endings!
  • Over 30 different in-game events, each with unique outcomes!
  • Over 5600 words of content!
  • Sweet rolls!

This is a game you have to play multiple times to get the full experience, so I heavily recommend replaying if you have the time!

This is the first game jam I've participated in, so I appreciate reviews and feedback! Ink is a tool I've wanted to learn, and making this project was a blast!

If you run into any bugs or oddities, let me know!

(https://twitter.com/claybreak)
